mapper.select: SELECT a.apt_no , a.apt_nm , a.building_type , a.location_id , l.location_nm , a.zipcode , a.jibun_addr , a.road_addr , a.dong_cnt , a.ho_cnt , a.tel_no , a.remark , a.reg_id , DATE_FORMAT(a.reg_dt,'${prop.dt.plain}') as reg_dt , a.update_id , DATE_FORMAT(a.update_dt,'${prop.dt.plain}') as update_dt FROM GND_APT_INFO a INNER JOIN GND_LOCATION l on (a.location_id = l.location_id)
SELECT count(*) as co FROM GND_APT_INFO a

SELECT a.apt_no , a.apt_nm , a.building_type , a.location_id , l.location_nm , a.zipcode , a.jibun_addr , a.road_addr , a.dong_cnt , a.ho_cnt , a.tel_no , a.remark , a.reg_id , DATE_FORMAT(a.reg_dt,'${prop.dt.plain}') as reg_dt , a.update_id , DATE_FORMAT(a.update_dt,'${prop.dt.plain}') as update_dt FROM GND_APT_INFO a INNER JOIN GND_LOCATION l on (a.location_id = l.location_id) WHERE apt_no = #{aptNo}
SELECT a.apt_no , a.apt_nm , a.location_id , l.location_nm , l.region_id FROM GND_APT_INFO a INNER JOIN GND_LOCATION l on (a.location_id = l.location_id) WHERE apt_no = #{aptNo}
